summary: Provides a unit‑test suite that checks the correct parsing and interpretation of 802.11 (Wi‑Fi) frame header fields, including size, version, type, subtype and the various flag bits such as ToDS, FromDS, MoreFrag, Retry, PowerManagement, MoreData and Order.
business_intent: Guarantee the reliability and spec‑compliance of the Wi‑Fi packet handling components by automatically validating header parsing logic and detecting regressions in future code changes.
